resources.string: You will be presented with 5 clues. Each clue will lead you to the location of one of your ingredients. When you think you have arrived to the correct location select \"Found It!\". Otherwise, panic and contemplate not showing up to the party at all. Just kidding, feel free select the \"Hint\" button if you need any help. Remember to get home before time runs out! Press start to begin.

It is Friday, you got home just to realize you did not make a dish for tonight\'s potluck. Social suicide! Fortunately, a recipe comes to mind. You search the pantry just to find out that you do not have any of the ingredients! Quickly, head to town and gather all of the ingredients needed to make your favorite dish.
Try looking uptown, maybe you\'ll find it on one of Hoboken\'s main streets, not far from the water.
"The first locally recorded game of baseball took place in Hoboken in 1846. Please visit the landmark of this historic site. "
